= Introduction =

This page describes members and activities of the OBO Foundry Operations Committee Outreach Working Group.


= Details =

The OBO Foundry Operations Committee Outreach WG is involved in public relations for the OBO Foundry. This includes monitoring and following up discussions on mailing lists, preparing documentation and educational materials, and presenting OBO Foundry activities at workshops, conferences, or other venues.

= Mailing list =

The mailing list for the OFOC Outreach Working Group is [mailto:obo-foundry-outreach-working-group@googlegroups.com obo-foundry-outreach-working-group@googlegroups.com]. Send an email to request to join the list. You do not have to be a member of the group to join the mailing list.

You can view the posts at [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!forum/obo-foundry-outreach-working-group https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!forum/obo-foundry-outreach-working-group].
